title: CryptoSyno
author: CryptoSyno
content: 🌐 WEBSITE - https://gaming.cryptosyno.io/🐦 TWITTER - https://twitter.com/CryptoSyno_CSYN👨🏻‍✈️KYC - https://www.coinscope.co/coin/csyn/airdrop🔎AUDIT - https://www.coinscope.co/coin/csyn/audit📄WHITEPAPER - https://cryptosyno.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/CSYN.pdfTl; Dr 😴CryptoSyno has a working product, not an empty promise, burns tokens, reflects tokens, KYC, Audited, Gaming logic for the stability and growth of the coin, Locked liquidity, and a project owner that won't stop until we're on the moon.Long Drawn-out Boring Description? 😯CryptoSyno is a cryptocurrency gaming platform and aims to develop & establish trust among the community by providing around-the-clock support, harvesting a nurturing & welcoming environment for all of our members/investors, & most importantly, ensuring everyone’s funds are safe for all token launches, games, and exchanges associated with the CryptoSyno brand."What if I'm not a gambler and just want to buy the token to get an ROI?" 🧐Okay, I know what you're thinking "I can care less about the slot machine and shit. Can I still make money from this even without gambling?" YES, and for multiple reasons!!!- We barely just launched, and it will soon be listed on coinmarketcap.- Token Burns & Reflections to holders.- Ran and operated by a hyper-focused autistic developer."Do you have anything developed yet" 🧐App: https://gaming.cryptosyno.ioAfter three losses in a row, the user is granted a 2x odds increase. Users will keep getting extra odds to increase for every loss if their losing streak is 3+. After winning any reward, probabilities will reset to normal.Further development? 🧐Our next casino game is a PVP Texas Holdem poker table where you can wager any Defi token, not just the $CSYN. (House edge sells the token and purchases $CSYN, and sends to dead address)Supply 7.77m | 1% Reflections | 2% Deflationary |2% Casino GamesThere are NO team tokens and NO ridiculously high taxes!*******************************************************CryptoSyno™ Mathematics and Engineering Labs, USA

comments.author: BitKongy
comments.body: Yeah many people went broke because they went all in on Luna project, there is nothing wrong doing this with Bitcoin but when it comes to altcoin anything can happen, lack of diversity with altcoins won't do you so well.
